DOC.brief_summary: This 2-year randomized, controlled trial examined the impact of a clinic-based, family teamwork intervention on glycemic control in youth with recently diagnosed type 1 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Optimizing Adherence and Glycemia in Youth With New Insulin-dependent Diabetes Mellitus (IDDM)
DOC.criteria: 8 to 17 years old Duration of type 1 diabetes between 2 months and 6 years Residence in New England or New York At least 1 outpatient visit in the past year Major comorbid psychiatric or medical illness in youth Diagnosis of an active major psychiatric disorder in either parent Diagnosis of a lifethreatening medical illness in either parent
